non-renewable.translation[0].definitions: non-renewable types of energy such as coal or gas cannot be replaced after they have been used
All countries are being asked to cut down on their use of non-renewable resources.
non-renewable.translation[1].definitions: non-renewable types of energy such as coal or oil cannot be replaced once they have been used
a tax on all forms of non-renewable energy
These regulations will only encourage a massive waste of valuable andnon-renewable natural resources.
